zorz: Puts extra emphasis on a word (mostly used to add sarcasm)
xor: Derivation of agent nouns from a verb stem. Substitution for -er or -r
zor: Derivation of agent nouns from a verb stem. Substitution for -er or -r
age: Derivation of a noun from a verb stem
ness: Derivation of a noun from an adjective stem
ed: Replacing the -e of past participle endings with an apostrophe or omiting it completely
&: Words containing -and-, -anned- or - ant- (or similar sounds) are replaced by ampersands (&)
